action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire
Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Jill,

So sorry for the back and forth. I think we have it now. Please review and let me know:
https://redskyinsurance.com.au/

Hi Heath,

Perhaps we should have had that call 😊 Thanks for that but also wanted the new text included as shown on that mock up - ie

Welcome to RedSky

We are a specialist marine underwriting agency - not a giant but supported by many. As Coverholders at Lloyd's we are able to

provide insurance across a broad range of marine products.

What Sets Us Apart

We are a skilled team with the expertise and experience to understand and evaluate your insurance requirements quickly and reliably.

With local claims settling authority we are able to make decisions swiftly. And above all we are here to do our best for our brokers and

their customers by delivering professional efficient advice and service with passion and pride.

J



Jill Murphy

Director



AU +61 447 668 777

NZ +64 211 459 998



jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au



Level 13, 50 Pitt Street

Sydney NSW 2000

www.redskyinsurance.com.au

Ah I just realised you wanted the content below the headings deleted! We have now done that too.

Apologies, I thought it was just the heading to be on one line.

Thanks

Hi Jill,

Do you mind sending me a screenshot please?

Hi Heath,

I have tried various computers and engines and the home page doesn't appear changed on any.

J



Jill Murphy

Director



AU +61 447 668 777

NZ +64 211 459 998



jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au



Level 13, 50 Pitt Street

Sydney NSW 2000

www.redskyinsurance.com.au

Hi Jill,

Ok perfect, we have now made those changes on the live site too 🙂

The All the PDF changes should be updated now too. We had changed it, but perhaps it was cached in your browser.

Heath,

The link you have used is correct and you will see my response on Loom.



The only other changes required as per my email yesterday was the - Home page to be updated as per "All the pdf"

Once you have published please let me know.

Thank you very much for doing this so quickly.

Kind Regards,

Jill



Jill Murphy

Director



AU +61 447 668 777

NZ +64 211 459 998



jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au



Level 13, 50 Pitt Street

Sydney NSW 2000

www.redskyinsurance.com.au

Hi Jill,

Thanks for booking in today.

We have made all of the changes on the live site, except the Broker Portal button.

For the Broker Portal button, I wanted to mock that up in staging for you first.
Here is a quick video explaination:
https://www.loom.com/share/bfd0cc2bfa00457d996a76696e338976?sid=db946a44-c8f1-4d77-bf17-3d510a9e3409

And here is the staging link:
https://stg-redsky-stg.kinsta.cloud/

Let me know what you think? If all good, we can likely skip this afternoon's meeting, unless of course there was anything else you needed help with 🙂

Hi Heath, I have scheduled a meeting for tomorrow. List as follows:- LEVEL OF IMPORTANCE - URGENT New Requirements
  • Broker Portal - we are launching a broker portal with one product. We need a portal button "BROKER PORTAL"- probably top right - which will then link to our IHQ system. Matt from InsuredHQ is copied and included in the meeting invitation for tomorrow.
The location (http://redsky.insuredhq.com/) and the portal (redsky-portal.insuredhq.com)
  • Policy Documents - for the moment need a new heading "Policy Documents" (located in between products and Assistance & Compliance). The attached two documents - Target Market Determination and Single Transit Policy Wording to be included under that tab.
LEVEL OF IMPORTANCE - STANDARD Changes to current Web Site
  • Assistance & Compliance - delete Target Market Determination. Everything else is still current
  • Hide/delete the "About Us" page
  • Home page to be updated as per "All the pdf"
Kind Regards, Jill Jill Murphy Director AU +61 447 668 777 NZ +64 211 459 998 jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au Level 13, 50 Pitt Street Sydney NSW 2000 www.redskyinsurance.com.au

attachments.filename: Cargo Single Transit - Target Market Determination.pdf
RedSky Cargo Single Transit Policy Wording V92024.pdf

full_threads.body:
Thanks Jill And Nichole, I'll be happy to help.

Jill, regarding a call, yes sure, here is my calendar link: https://calendly.com/heathmaguire/30min

Please detail any tasks you would like us to execute on the website. We will then work through them at our end. I avoid combing through email chains as items can be easily missed or lost in translation.

If you still require the SSL certificate, please note, the certificate we supply is only for the public-facing website. For any subdomains, a new, separate SSL certificate will need to be issued. I hope that makes sense.

I look forward to hearing back from you.

Thanks Nicole.





Hi Heath,



I am not sure what Nichole has shared with you but attached is an email which hopefully explains the majority of what we need doing.



The most urgent is actually getting our policy documents loaded along with the Broker Portal button so that we can start using our system.



Would it be possible to catch up sometime in the next couple of days together with Matt Davies from IHQ so that we can discuss what needs to happen?





Thanks,

Jill













Jill Murphy

Director



AU +61 447 668 777

NZ +64 211 459 998



jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au



Level 13, 50 Pitt Street

Sydney NSW 2000



www.redskyinsurance.com.au

Hi Heath


Jill from RedSky requires some updates on her current site.


Putting you both in touch direct - Heath if you can please help Jill with what is required that would be great. Will leave you both to outlines what's needed.


Much appreciated.
Nichole

Nichole Valk
Projects & Brand
The Envest Group


 Raise a request via the Support Centre

From: Jill Murphy <jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au>
Date: Wednesday, 6 November 2024 at 8:29 PM
To: Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>
Cc: Matt Davies <matt.d@insuredhq.com>
Subject: RE: RedSky - Website

Nic,
Sorry, just ignore my last email I hadn't seen this one from you.

I am copying in Matt Davies from Insured HQ who are finalising the UAT on the portal. If I can leave you both to chat that would be awesome.
His details are as follows:-
Phone: (+64) 9 576 4639
Mobile (+64) 22 173 8503
Web: www.insuredhq.com
Email: matt.d@insuredhq.com



Matt, Nic is in Brisbane so 3 hours behind NZ.


It will be a lot easier for me next week when I am back in Australia.



Thanks,
Jill



Jill Murphy

Director

AU +61 447 668 777

NZ +64 211 459 998

jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au

Level 13, 50 Pitt Street
Sydney NSW 2000

www.redskyinsurance.com.au


From: Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 6 November 2024 12:15 PM
To: Jill Murphy <jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au>
Subject: Re: RedSky - Website


For this one, yes if you can email insuredhq and intro me to arrange what they need on both domain and website host side.. I can help there.

Will just need to know re timing from you with the listed web updates on the site and when you need those vs aligning with this portal.

Welcome to call on teams today anytime (if that works overseas?), may be easier to chat over..

Nichole Valk
Projects & Brand
The Envest Group

From: Jill Murphy <jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au>
Date: Wednesday, 30 October 2024 at 12:03 AM
To: Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>
Subject: RE: RedSky - Website

Hi Nic,
Thanks for coming back to me. The IT guys are still completing a bit of UAT on the portal but did you see the instructions below from IHQ? If that is not everything you need perhaps I can put IHQ in contact directly with you.

I am actually in Vietnam for a couple of weeks and back in Australia on the 13th November - but obviously still working now RedSky is a team of two.

The documents are all ready with no changes needed.

I'm happy to catch up Friday or Monday and will try to phone.

Cheers
Jill
Jill Murphy

Director

AU +61 447 668 777

NZ +64 211 459 998

jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au

Level 13, 50 Pitt Street
Sydney NSW 2000

www.redskyinsurance.com.au


From: Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 29 October 2024 1:09 PM
To: Jill Murphy <jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au>
Subject: Re: RedSky - Website


Hi Jill

Sorry for the delayed response! Canberra was great - lots going on that's for sure.

This is all possible and happy to sort - when adding the 'button' - is this ready and is there a link they have supplied for the "IHQ system" ?
Also, with those docs, are they also ready to include as I make the changes or are you making further updates?

Happy to jump on a call anytime if easier, or just give me a bell on the mobile.
Cheers
Nic

Nichole Valk
Projects & Brand
The Envest Group

From: Jill Murphy <jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au>
Date: Tuesday, 22 October 2024 at 10:42 AM
To: Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>
Subject: RedSky - Website

Hi Nic,
I hope you are well. Seems like it was a big week in Canberra. Shame I missed it.

We have a few things happening with our IT and I wonder if you can help me - or move this onto someone. You might recall the last time we spoke I mentioned that we were starting a broker portal and I was going to change the website to incorporate our policy wordings etc.

I have a few things I need to do and also you will see below from our IT guys which to be honest I am not sure how to respond to.

Changes to current Web Site
You did most of the immediate changes when we were talking together. Looking at the rest, given there are only two employees at the moment I think it is best to hide/delete the "About Us" page and then I have updated the Home page as attached. I want to keep it simple until we get our new direction / strategy squared away.

Products - page looks a bit sad but will worry about it late.

Assistance & Compliance - delete Target Market Determination. Everything else is still current


New Requirements

Broker Portal - to begin with we are launching one product but will hopefully be the start of a number - see below from IHQ who are our providers / designers etc. We need a portal button "BROKER PORTAL"- probably top right - which will then link to our IHQ system.

Policy Documents - I need to include our policy document and TMD for Cargo Single Transit as attached. I will add to these as the wordings get update. Do we have a tab "Policy Documents" or "Resources" and put the Assistance/Compliance/Wordings/TMD all under that tab? I would defer to you on that.


Hopefully that all makes sense. I am around all week if you would like to have a TEAMS call.

Thanks for your help.

Kind Regards,
Jill












From: Jon Davies <jon.d@insuredhq.com>
Sent: Monday, 21 October 2024 6:08 PM
To: Jill Murphy <jill.murphy@redskyinsurance.com.au>; Matt Davies <matt.d@insuredhq.com>
Subject: Re: RedSky


Hi Jill,

The new location for Ruby (redsky.insuredhq.com) and the portal (redsky-portal.insuredhq.com) will be launched and ready in the next 48 hours (my goal). I just need to coordinate the outage window. More on that later.

For the portal, let me know if you would like to use "portal.redskyinsurance.com.au," as discussed earlier today.

There are two ways to do this.

1. Someone from your IT team (likely the same person who manages your website) to send me the wildcard SSL Certifcate and files for redskyinsurance.com.au

2. I can send an email request to whoever manages the redskyinsurance.com.au domain to process the request below



Thanks,

- Jon
